1650030.name: Alekon Original Soundtrack
1650030.description:
All of the original music from Alekon, including location and character themes, totaling 2 hours of music acrosss 73 tracks, in both MP3 and high quality WAV formats!

Music can have tremendous influence when composers pour their hearts into it. If the soundtracks from series such as Zelda and Mario didn't exist, then it's safe to say that I would have never have started Alekon. I hope that the music of Alekon can inspire others in the same way that the gaming classics have inspired me.

Thank you all so much for the support!

- Kevin
